name: MBM International
body:
###Software Development
We are experts in developing solutions based on Open Source software and hardware. Our projects range from small to large scale. We manage projects with developers in our offices in Vietnam as well as with our network of developers around the world.

###ICT Research
We conduct market research throughout Asia and support you to develop and implement marketing strategies to grow your business in the region.

###Consulting
With the technological revolution new opportunities and challenges constantly arise - requiring permanent adaptation. In an established company a facilitator becomes a necessity to support change and the implementation of new processes. In a startup resources to set up business process require a strong focus on the core business. We want to be your partner implementing your ideas. We offer you consultants who achieve your goals.

###About: Make your ideas work
We have a track record developing software for international companies and startups. With our resources we support partners and customers with consulting and research services in Asia. We are dedicated to support you to make your ideas work.

#### Hong Phuc Dang
After her childhood in Vietnam Hong Phuc lived several years in the US and Singapore. She is widely recognized as an Open Source community and graphics software expert. She has worked on research papers and projects for top International data research companies. Hong Phuc has spoken at numerous International conferences and organized GNOME.Asia and FOSSASIA.

#### Mario Behling
Mario is an entrepreneur who grew up in Berlin, Germany. He is a Linux expert and the founder of the light Ubuntu distribution, Lubuntu. Mario has worked with the One Laptop per Child project in Afghanistan and blogs about Freifunk, the free wifi mesh project. Mario co-organized the enterprise matchmaking events FOSS Bridge in Asia.

#### The Company
MBM International was founded in 2009 by Mario Behling (Germany) and DANG Hong Phuc (Vietnam/Singapore) uniting independent operations of the partners. Marketing, ICT and International Services - MBM is leading the Vietnamese and Asian market towards innovation and producing higher revenue generating products. The registered limited company supports global clients online, in-house, at production facilities, at events, conferences and trade shows.

The company builds its operations on the basis of its internationally experienced staff and a proven track record of its founders in the business consultant, ICT and marketing sector.

The economic, security, reliability, and quality advantages of our services give organizations and enterprises a competitive advantage. We enable our clients to provide better services and products.

* Leading business services in Vietnam with top consultants offering services in English, French, German, Japanese and Vietnamese.
* With over 10 years of experience in the regions market of the company's top management from Germany, Japan and internationally experienced Vietnam staff.
* Direct level contacts to top regional and national decision makers.
* Providing services in cooperation with global and local partners including Google, lubuntu, IBM, SUN Microsystems, Quang Trung Software City, IOIT (Viện Công nghệ thông tin), GTZ (German Development Cooperation), InWEnt (Capacity Building International Germany), INRIA France, OW2 Consortium and the LXDE Foundation.

#### Track Record
* Successfully completed projects for world leading companies such as Google, Canonical, Sun Microsystems and Foxconn
* Large developer community with more than 800 direct contributors including more than 300 contributors to the luuntu project
* Strong research record and international cooperations implementing projects for development companies including GTZ (German Development cooperation) and InWEnt (Capacity Building International)
* Supporting deployment of thousands of OLPC XO computers in Afghanistan
* Event organization of top Asian developer meet ups including GNOME.Asia and FOSSASIA

More than 10 years of experience in software development and projects deployment
* Effective communication
* Internationally experienced team working efficiently across languages and cultural barriers
* Leveraging time zone differences
* Management best practices

###Careers
Do you want to work in an international environment? Are you able to actively collaborate with people and organizations in your local environment and across the globe? Do you believe in sharing knowledge with your partners to achieve the highest outcome? Please send us your CV at careers@mbm.vn.
